name: InsideUs
description:
General Information and tips

This is a cool fps game where you can shoot enemies and earn points. And in this game, we will be walking inside our organs and blood vessels and there will be a lot of germs in it you need to kill all the germs. There are three guns in the game to change guns press 1,2,3 and share my game.

Controls and Instruction

Make sure you unzip the rar file

Move your player with arrow keys or W, A, S, D keys

More features will be added to the game later

Share my game with your friends and family
